name: PIZZUTTI, INC., Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant

parties: PIZZUTTI, INC., Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Karen Marie Gard, Howard Greeley Hopkirk, PA Office of Attorney General, for Com.
Douglas A. Campbell, Campbell & Levine, L.L.C., Pittsburgh, for Pizzutti, Inc.
Frederick D. Rapone, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
PIZZUTTI, INC., Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 2010.
Decided Nov. 17, 2010.
Karen Marie Gard, Howard Greeley Hopkirk, PA Office of Attorney General, for Com.
Douglas A. Campbell, Campbell & Levine, L.L.C., Pittsburgh, for Pizzutti, Inc.
Frederick D. Rapone, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
